00016

00018 
00019 class UncaughtExceptionHandler : public Object {
00020 public:
00021     UncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00022     virtual ~UncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00023     virtual void handle(Exception & ex) const = 0;
00024 public:
00025 #ifdef SYLPH_DEBUG
00026     static UncaughtExceptionHandler * handler = new DebugUncaughtExceptionHandler;
00027 #else
00028     static UncaughtExceptionHandler * handler = new DefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler;
00029 #endif
00030 };
00031 
00032 static UncaughtExceptionHandler UncaughtExceptionHandler::handler;
00033 
00034 class DefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler : public virtual UncaughtExceptionHandler {
00035     void handle(Exception & ex);
00036 };
00037 
00038 class DebugUncaughtExceptionHandler : public virtual UncaughtExceptionHandler {
00039     void handle(Exception & ex);
00040 };
00041 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
